Detailed Description

Extracts an array of centerline points from marching cubes filtered Polydata.

Centerline extracts the centerline from a volume using thinning Based on Iordanescu and Summers Automated Centerline for CT Colonography Academic Radiology Vol 10 No 11 Nov 2003 pp1291-1301

Has properties: WaitRendering *wait; OSIVoxel *startingPoint OSIVoxel *endingPoint int thinningIterations
